name: Hero's Choice 2021 7DRL
description:
This is my entry for the 7 Day Roguelike Challenge in 2021. All art, design, and programming was completed by me in one week. 

Fulfill your destiny by travelling across mysterious lands in search of the six Temples of Darkness. Collect powerful items to aid you in your journey.  

Designer's note: This is a procedurally generated game. The overworld map, dungeons, and items change each time you play.
